column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Apparently you have to be in the Illuminati to know how things work here. There's a large line outside where no one is actually in line. There's a host there taking names but since I just wanted something to go I didn't figure I'd have to do all that. I go inside where there's another line with people everywhere. Not knowing what to do or order. I got up to the woman and she said what name did you give the hostess? I said I just want something to go I didn't talk to her. Which she said no matter what you give a name. So you wait in line to give your name to wait in line only then to wait for your pizza. Now you know
column2: enjoy it because it looked amazing but the lack of direction is truly disappointing
